name: Eloriasha
description:
Inspired by the classics, Eloriasha is a simple yet challenging action-platformer about a man who's trying to save the world. Run, jump, attack, slide and shoot your way through 6 action-packed levels!

Also included is...
- That Awesome 8/16-bit Retro Feeling
- Cool, Creative Stages and Scary Bosses
- Beautiful Pixel Art and a Fantastic Soundtrack by Amazing People
- A Meaningful Story
- Dying a Lot (well, probably...)

...oh, yeah! (:
